txt.en: You have left not a single, black stone unturned in the Abyss of Mordath. Evils have been banished, lost heroes have been freed, and three of the Seven Rings have been scattered in the depths of the Black Pits -- never to be found again. The Dwarves of Middle-earth are free of the corrupting influences of the Seven, and though their greed may still linger, the Rings shall no longer lead them to their dooms.
